hanzi-su-wiki:
虚

Значения

Пустой, бесполезный; ложь, неосторожность, неосмотрительность; пустота, свободное место, пустые слова

Мнемоника

Необитаемые холмы 业, где могут жить только тигры 虍.

Варианты

虛
purpleculture_pinyin:
xū
emptiness; void; abstract theory or guiding principles; empty or unoccupied; diffident or timid; false; humble or modest; (of health) weak; virtual; in vain
пустота; пустота; абстрактная теория или руководящие принципы; пустые или незанятые; застенчивый или робкий; ложный; скромный или скромный; (здоровья) слабый; виртуальный; напрасно
rtega_mnemonic:
虛虛RS
虚虚		虗𠧝𣦄𧆳虚void, emptiness, unpreparedness, crack, fissure, false
  • place on the mountains 㐀 where the tiger 虍 dwells 𣦄 → 虛 → 虚: emptiness with cracks and fissures in the ground
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 虛)
Antonyms: 实
Ideographic: A tiger 虍 stalking in the bushes 业
purpleculture_examples:
虚假 [ xū jiǎ ]: false; phony; pretense
虚拟 [ xū nǐ ]: to imagine; to make up; fictitious; theoretical; hypothetical; (computing) to emulate; virtual
空虚 [ kōng xū ]: hollow; emptiness; meaningless
弄虚作假 [ nòng xū zuò jiǎ ]: to practice fraud (idiom); by trickery
虚伪 [ xū wěi ]: false; hypocritical; artificial; sham
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 虍 [ hū ] tiger
    • 业 [ yè ] business, profession; to study, to work
heisig_chinese_memo: A tiger profession at the circus involves 'taming' the tiger.  This is a false hope because a tiger can never be truly tamed.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: void, emptiness, unpreparedness, crack, fissure, untruth
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: пустота, пустота, неготовность, трещина, трещина, неправда
koohiiStory1: In Japanese folklore there is no hell, but there is the void. There, a row of tigers waits in the blackness to devour those souls who have failed in their spiritual life.
koohiiStory2: Warning to Sigfreid and Roy: Your entertainment contract will be null and void unless you can make all the tigers stand in a row.
jp_example_words: 謙虚(けんきょ): modesty, humility
jp_readingExamples: 虚無 (きょむ), 虚偽 (きょぎ), 空虚 (くうきょ)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tiger, clad in spikes, exists in the void. This tiger is from another dimension where tigers rule the earth, clad in armor with spikes. The void has allowed this tiger to cross dimensional planes.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Tigers are pretty intimidating just on their own, let alone with spikey armor. Imagine this tiger, covered in spikes. It’s roaring at you. Pretty scary, huh?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The aforementioned void has opened up in Little Kyoto (きょ). The spiked void tigers chose to come here in order to face off against the Hanshin Tigers baseball team in battle. It will be a vicious match here in Little Kyoto. Since this is taking place in Little Kyoto and not Japan itself, the Hanshin Tigers won't have the home field advantage. Who will win?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture this grand match taking place in Little Kyoto. Actual tigers versus the Hanshin Tigers. It’s truly a sight to behold. The void tigers are armed with their spikes and the Hanshin Tigers are armed with their bats. Hear the crack of wood and the roar of tigers in the air as the battle commences.
Ru_Meaning: void, emptiness, unpreparedness, crack, fissure, untruth
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 匕 (ложка), 卜 (гадание), 厂 (скала), 虍 (тигр)
Ru_trainchinese:
xū: (прил/нареч) робкий, застенчивый; слабый; зря, напрасно
xū: (графема) пустой, порожний; скромный; ложный; главный принцип; пустота; (кит. мед.) нехватка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the tiger (虍) is almost lined up (业) to cross the void
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Tiger's are afraid of nothing?  False.  This tiger tried to take a bite of a cactus and now he's terrified of them.

Pinyin: xū
English Definition: emptiness; void; abstract theory or guiding principles; empty or unoccupied; diffident or timid; false; humble or modest; (of health) weak; virtual; in vain
Antonyms: 实

①空：虚无。虚实。虚度。虚名。虚左(尊敬地空出左边的座位，古代以左为尊)。空虚。乘虚而入。
②不真实的：虚伪。虚假。虚妄。虚惊。虚夸。虚构。虚传。虚张声势。
③内心怯懦：做贼心虚。
④不自满：虚心。谦虚。虚怀若谷(喻对人十分谦虚)。
⑤抽象的：虚词。
⑥衰弱：虚弱。虚胖。虚汗。虚脱。气虚。血虚。
⑦星名，二十八宿之一。
⑧古同“墟”，大丘。
⑨古同“圩”，集市。

Liushutong characters (20)

虚字的基本解释

虚
xū
空：虚无。虚实。虚度。虚名。虚左（尊敬地空出左边的座位，古代以左为尊）。空虚。乘虚而入。
不真实的：虚伪。虚假（ji?）。虚妄。虚惊。虚夸。虚构。虚传。虚张声势。
内心怯懦：做贼心虚。
不自满：虚心。谦虚。虚怀若谷（喻对人十分谦虚）。
抽象的：虚词。
衰弱：虚弱。虚胖。虚汗。虚脱。气虚。血虚。
星名，二十八宿之一。
古同“墟”，大丘。
古同“圩”，集市。
实

虚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xū］
［《廣韻》朽居切，平魚，曉。］
［《廣韻》去魚切，平魚，溪。］
亦作“虗1”。“虛1”的新字形。
(1)空无所有。与“實”相对。
(2)罄尽；耗费。
(3)洞孔；空隙。引申指薄弱环节。
(4)空闲；间断。
(5)空出；空着。
(6)疏松，不坚实或不结实。
(7)稀少。
(8)虚弱。
(9)心慌，不踏实。
(10)谦虚。
(11)虚假，不真实。
(12)指空话或诓骗。
(13)空际，天空。
(14)引申为凌空。
(15)指抽象的理论。
(16)含酒漱洗口腔。参见“虚口”。
(17)副词。凭空，毫无根据。
(18)副词。徒然。不起作用。
(19)副词。预先。
(20)通“舒”。缓慢；从容。参见“虚邪”、“虚徐”。
(21)道教语。指无欲无为的思想境界。
(22)指爻位。
(23)古代占卜推算日辰用的术语。参见“孤虚”。
(24)星宿名。北方玄武七宿之一，居中间。古人据其运行的情况，以考正仲秋的节气。
[②]［

虚字的英文翻译

◎ 虚
void, emptiness, empty, in vain, false, weak, humble

虚字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虍字部】　虛； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1074第10
〔古文〕?【唐韻】朽居切【集韻】【正韻】休居切，?音噓。空虛也。　又【易·繫辭傳】周流六虛。【註】六虛，六位也。【疏】位本無體，因爻始見，故稱虛也。　又【大戴禮】虛土之人大。【註】虛，縱也。　又孤虛。【史記·龜筴傳】日辰不全，故有孤虛。　又星名。【書·堯典】宵中星虛。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】虛氏。見《姓苑》。　又虛無，山名。【顏氏家訓】柏人城東有一孤山，或呼爲虛無山。　又【廣韻】去魚切，音祛。【說文】大丘也。【集韻】古者九夫爲井，四井爲邑，四邑爲丘，丘謂之虛。　又地名。【春秋·桓十二年】會宋公于虛。【註】宋地。　又水名。【前漢·地理志】琅邪郡虛水。　又次也。【晉語】實沉之虛，晉人是居。　又【韻補】喜語切，音許。《毛詩》升彼虛矣，以望楚矣。　又叶虛王切。【道藏歌】提攜高上賔，反吾素靈房。道場靈沫內，高歌登大虛。【干祿字書】通作虚。

虚字的源字形

虚字的起名意思

：指谦虚、无欲无为的思想境界；

Imaginary
Basic explanation of words
Imaginary
xū
Void: nothingness. Virtual reality. waste. Vanity. Xu Zuo (respectfully vacate the left seat, in ancient times, the left was honored). emptiness. Take advantage of the emptiness and enter.
Untrue: hypocrisy. False (ji?). Vain. false alarm. Boastful. imaginary. False pass. bluff.
Inner cowardice: Be a guilty conscience.
Not complacent: humbly. modest. Ruogu (Yu is very humble to people).
Abstract: function words.
Weakness: Weakness. puffiness. Virtual sweat. collapse. Deficiency of Qi. Blood deficiency.
Star name, one of twenty-eight places.
Ancient Tong "xu", Daqiu.
Ancient Tong "Wu", the market.
real
Imaginary
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xū］
["Guangyun" Rotten House Cut, Pingyu, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" cut fish, flat fish, stream. ]
Also known as "虗1". The new glyph of "virtual 1".
(1) Nothing. Contrast with "real".
(2) Exhausted; exhausted.
(3) Holes; voids. The extension refers to the weak link.
(4) Idle; Intermittent.
(5) Vacant; empty.
(6) Loose, not firm or not firm.
(7) Rare.
(8) Weakness.
(9) Flustered and not at ease.
(10) Modesty.
(11) False and untrue.
(12) Refers to empty talk or cheating.
(13) Space, sky.
(14) The extension is volley.
(15) Refers to abstract theories.
(16) Rinse the mouth with wine. See "virtual mouth".
(17) Adverbs. Out of thin air, groundless.
(18) Adverbs. in vain. Doesn't work.
(19) Adverbs. advance.
(20) Through "Shu". Slow; calm. See "Xu Xie", "Xu Xu".
(21) Taoist language. Refers to the state of mind without desire and doing nothing.
(22) Refers to the line position.
(23) The term used in ancient divination to calculate the date. See "Guxu".
(24) The name of the stars. One of the seven places of Xuanwu in the north, in the middle. The ancients tested Zheng Zhongqiu's solar terms according to its operation.

[Note] Six virtual, six are also. 【Sparse】The position has no body, because the line is first seen, so it is called empty.　[Big Dai Li] People's Congress of the Void Land. [Note] Xu, Zongye.　I am lonely again. 【Historical Records·Gui Jie Biography】The day and the hour are not complete, so there is loneliness.　Also star name. 【Book·Yaodian】Stars in the night are empty.　Another last name. 【Tongzhi·clan abbreviation】Xu clan. See "Surname Garden".　It's nothingness, the name of the mountain. [Said the text] Daqiu also. [Jiyun] The ancient nine husbands are wells, the four wells are the eups, and the four eups are the mounds, and the mau is called emptiness.　Also place name. (недостаток)
Виртуальный x0
[Прикреплено] Руины x0
писец
Кай
Он состоит из «Дянь» (голова тигра. Звук) и «Цю» (значение).
«Шуовэнь»: «Сюй, дацю тоже». То есть «Датушань».
«Книга песен»: «Продвигайте пустоту другого, чтобы посмотреть на Чу». Сквозь «руины», руины.
Расширяется до «пустоты», «неполноценности», «дефекта», «ложного», «трусливого» и других значений.
золото

Radicals: 虍  (tiger, spikes)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tiger, clad in spikes, exists in the void. This tiger is from another dimension where tigers rule the earth, clad in armor with spikes. The void has allowed this tiger to cross dimensional planes.
Tigers are pretty intimidating just on their own, let alone with spikey armor. Imagine this tiger, covered in spikes. It’s roaring at you. Pretty scary, huh?
Reading Mnemonic
The aforementioned void has opened up in Little Kyoto (きょ). The spiked void tigers chose to come here in order to face off against the Hanshin Tigers baseball team in battle. It will be a vicious match here in Little Kyoto. Since this is taking place in Little Kyoto and not Japan itself, the Hanshin Tigers won't have the home field advantage. Who will win?
Picture this grand match taking place in Little Kyoto. Actual tigers versus the Hanshin Tigers. It’s truly a sight to behold. The void tigers are armed with their spikes and the Hanshin Tigers are armed with their bats. Hear the crack of wood and the roar of tigers in the air as the battle commences.

Examples: 虚無 (きょむ), 虚偽 (きょぎ), 空虚 (くうきょ)
一 (один), 匕 (ложка), 卜 (гадание), 厂 (скала), 虍 (тигр)
